compatibility.notes: LiLiQ-P-1.1 is a permissive license that allows for integration with other permissive licenses without imposing restrictions. However, it is incompatible with copyleft licenses like GPL.

key_requirements: Ensure that the software is identified as being under the LiLiQ-P license.
Maintain copyright notices in all copies or substantial portions of the software.
State any changes made to the software when distributing modified versions.
license.name: LiLiQ-P-1.1
obligations: Distribute the source code when distributing the software.
Provide an offer to distribute the source code if not included.
Include the license text with any distribution.
